text.text_translated: Basements are always scary places in horror films, no matter what type of house it is. This is usually where something is hiding, or where a bad `psychopath` has put their tools. A `psychopath` is a person with a serious mental illness that makes them act in a violent or dangerous way. Basements are always dark and often wet, and you can only get to them by a small staircase. Also, they are always creepy, even when nothing is there.
